goal: My plans for Saturday night just got cancelled. My evening is free from 7 PM onwards. Find me a table for one at any sushi restaurant with at least 4.5 stars and book it. Then, block off a 90-minute slot on my calendar for 'Solo Sushi Night' starting at whatever time you booked.

evals.description: Verify that a restaurant booking for one person has been made in OpenDining.
Verify that a calendar event titled 'Solo Sushi Night' has been created in GoCalendar.
Verify that the calendar event is exactly 90 minutes long (1 hour and 30 minutes).
Verify that the restaurant booked is a sushi restaurant (by checking its name).
